messages.msgSnippet: I thought the companion article about play was even more interesting. I think homeschoolers can get caught up in this trap just as easily as anyone else.

I thought the companion article about play was even more interesting. I
think homeschoolers can get caught up in this trap just as easily as anyone
else.

http://www.time.com/time/education/article/0,8599,107264,00.html

Olivia

-----Original Message-----
From: yuliwomie@... [mailto:yuliwomie@...]
Sent: Saturday, April 28, 2001 3:16 PM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Whoa! Mainstream Media Promoting
Unschooling???


The cover of the April 30 Time magazine shows a child dressed as a
mini-Einstein, crazy hair and all,and the headline reads:

SO YOU WANT TO RAISE A SUPERKID:::Throw away those flash cards, relax
and let kids be kids. A how-to (and how-not-to)guide for parents
PLUS: The day-care debate

Whoa! I mean, whoa! While I'm sick to death of magazines that presume
to teach us all how to parent, I am astounded at this headline on,of
all things, a Time magazine. I had to rush over to the computer to
tell you mamafriends, and now I'm off to read the article.

Juli
